# vxe-core

[简体中文](README.md) | [繁體中文](README.zh-TW.md) | English  

Vxe UI core library.

## Install

```shell
npm install @vxe-ui/core
```

```javascript
// ...
import VxeCore from '@vxe-ui/core'
// ...

VxeCore.setConfig({
  // ...
})
```
